description: The Ivory Skin Acolyte is a follower of a forbidden cult that worships an ancient and malevolent entity. Their skin is unnaturally pale, almost translucent, giving them a ghostly appearance. They are often found in the ruins of ancient temples, performing dark rituals to summon eldritch horrors.

traits.name: Dark Ritualist
traits.description: The Ivory Skin Acolyte can cast dark rituals that require 10 minutes to perform. These rituals can summon minor undead or cause unnatural darkness within a 30-foot radius.

actions.name: Shadow Bolt
actions.description: Ranged Spell Attack: +4 to hit, range 60 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (1d10+3) necrotic damage.

actions.name: Dagger
actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d4+2) piercing damage.
